# ActiveDevelop

## Work Process

| | |
|---|---|
| **No.** | 11 |
| **Last modified:** | 05/10/2019 at 13:55 |

---

### Code 11 — Large Item Ironer - Large Items Crosswise

Pick up items from laundry cart, clip into clamps. Change program according to item type, perform cart change. Transfer small items from laundry cart to input machine tray.

Pick up items from laundry cart, shake out pillows, pull out corners if necessary, place on input machine, pick up small items, shake out, place, guide item partially.

---

### Cost Center

| trg | 0.00 Min | tr | 0.00 Min |
|-----|----------|-----|----------|
| **tg** | **0.50 Min** | **te** | **0.54 Min** |

**ta = 1.00 × te = 0.54 Min**

---

## Work Steps

### 1. Program 12 Large Items Cross 3 Clamp Input
**Code:** 05.01 thb 002

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.37 | 0.80 | 0.00 | 0.32 |

Sheets clamp input 1-lane crosswise > 1.5 m width 34 m/min

---

### 2. Program 51 Tablecloths 1-lane 2 Clamp Input
**Code:** 05.01 thb 003

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.28 | 0.10 | 0.00 | 0.031 |

Tablecloths clamp input 1-lane (thick) 18 m/min

---

### 3. Program 52 2 Pers. Manual Input
**Code:** 05.01 thb 008

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 1.26 | 0.10 | 0.00 | 0.14 |

Tablecloths 2 pers. pick up from laundry cart, place on ironer belt, align. (Stop machine by hand) Round-oval tablecloths 1-lane

---

### 4. Cart change
**Code:** 05.02 tnb 001

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.011 | 1.00 | 0.00 | 0.012 |

---

### 5. Machine changeover
**Code:** 05.02 tnb 003

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.0067 | 1.00 | 0.00 | 0.0074 |

Change machine from manual input to clamp input, or from clamp input to manual input.

---

### 6. Fetch separator cloth, feed in
**Code:** 05.02 tnb 004

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.0044 | 1.00 | 0.00 | 0.0049 |

Fetch separator cloth from output, feed in.

---

### 7. Pick up fallen items, set aside
**Code:** 05.02 tnb 005

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.0044 | 1.00 | 0.00 | 0.0049 |

Pick up fallen items from tray, re-feed if necessary or discard into container. Item from feeder.

---

### 8. Program change
**Code:** 05.02 tnb 006

| UT | Qty | tr [Min] | te [Min] |
|----|-----|----------|----------|
| 0.0055 | 1.00 | 0.00 | 0.0061 |

|----|-----|----------|----------|
